name: Super Mayhem 17
summary: Super MAYhem 17 is a 28-level Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports, created by members of the Doomworld forums across May and June 2017. It is the sixth installment of the MAYhem series, and was led by Michael Fraize (Marcaek). The WAD features a unique Mario theme, with textures and sprite replacements from various games in the franchise, although monsters and weapons are unchanged, and the changes to power-ups are purely cosmetic. Maps were also limited to containing a maximum of 256 things and a playable area size of 5120x3840 map units, although some did exceed these limitations.
